info.description: Provides fast, reliable access to housing benefit information.
info.title: Citizen Housing Benefit API

parameters.name: apiKey
parameters.description: Identifier used to identify each consumers and perform authorisation (e.g. xQFmnA7KAO6705R52AmCVzH5JmklyaDf)

parameters.name: correlationId
parameters.description: Identifier used to locate related transactions (e.g. 12345678-1234-1234-1234-123456789012)

localAuthorityReferenceNumber.description: Local Authority ID: Code allocated by DWP IAD

softwareProvider.description:
Software Provider (SHBE field 274)
1 : Northgate-IS
2 : Capita (Previously known as Academy)
3 : Northgate Orbis
5 : Civica Open Revenues (Previously known as IBS)
6 : In House
99 : Other

gender.description:
Claimant's gender (SHBE field 177)
M : Male
F : Female
X : gender is unknown

shortTermSupportedAccommodation.description:
Short term supported accommodation indicator (SHBE field 48)
0 : Not exempt or specified accommodation
1 : Accommodation is short-term, emergency or transitional
2 : Accommodation is longer term

supportedAccommodation.description:
Supported accommodation indicator (SHBE field 49)
0 : Not “Specified Accommodation”
1 : Supported Exempt Accommodation
2 : Specified Accommodation (not including Supported Exempt Accommodation

tenancyType.description:
Tenancy type (SHBE field 9)
1 : LA tenant
2 : Private tenant regulated tenancy (non HA / RSL)
3 : Private tenant deregulated tenancy (non HA / RSL)
4 : Housing Association / RSL tenants (including Housing Action Trusts, but excluding temporary or short-term accommodation cases.)
5 : Owner Occupier
6 : Private tenant other (use only if 2, 3, 4 or 10 cannot be used)
7 : Tenure not known
8 : Non HRA rent rebate and HRA rent rebate subject to the LHA-based subsidy rules
9 : Private Boarder
10 : Temporary or short-term accommodation cases where the landlord is a registered Housing Association, and the claim is subject to the LHA-based subsidy rules.

childBenefitReferenceNumber.description: Dependant's Child Benefit Reference Number (SHBE field 309)

closedDate.description: Date HB claim closed / withdrawn / decided unsuccessful / defective (SHBE field 202)

dateChangeEffectiveFrom.description: Date change of details are effective from (when the change has an effect on benefit entitlement) (SHBE field 253)

dateNotifiedOfClaimChange.description: Date LA first notified of change in claim details  (SHBE field 251)

dateOfFirstPayment.description: Date of first payment on most recent HB claim following a full decision being made on the claim (SHBE field 72)

dateSupersessionDecisionMade.description: Date supersession decision was made on the HB claim (SHBE field 255)

firstDecisionOnHbClaimDate.description: Date of first decision on most recent HB claim (SHBE field 37)

housingBenefitScheme.description:
The HB scheme the claim is assessed in accordance with (SHBE field 63)
1 : Claim received on or after 02/01/96 but prior to 06/10/97. Because of continuous entitlement to HB, the claimant remains entitled to a 50% ‘top up’ between the LRR and the CRR
2 : Claim received anytime on or after 07/10/96 , with the claimant potentially subject to the SRR 
3 : Claim received on or after 06/10/97 with the claimant potentially subject to the full impact of the LRR 
4 : The restrictions of the LRR or SRR schemes do not apply

howWasChangeIdentified.description:
If not annual uprating, how was the change identified (SHBE field 254)
1 : Claimant letter/e-mail/fax
2 : Claimant telephone call
3 : Notified through e-channels
4 : JCP report
5 : Pension Service report
6 : 3rd Party (e.g. Landlord) report
7 : LA intervention: visit
8 : LA intervention: review
9 : Fraud investigation
10 : LA activity: other (diary date prompt, LHA annual reviews etc)
11 : Accuracy check
12 : Outcome of appeal / reconsideration / revision
14 : Royal Mail: Do not re-direct 
15 : CIS prompt/ATLAS
16 : Tell Us Once
17 : One-strike/Two-strike
19 : Verify Earnings and Pensions Service (VEP)
99 : Other

lctrStatus.description:
Status of LCTR claim at extract date (SHBE field 34)
0 : LCTR not in payment
1 : LCTR in payment 
2 : LCTR suspended

lhaRegulationsApplied.description:
LHA regulations applied (SHBE field 62)
1 : Claim assessed under the LHA, with the eligible rent calculated in accordance with HB R 13D or HB SPC R 13D.

locality.description: Broad Rental Market Area (BRMA) code for the location where the claimant lives (SHBE field 208)

nonSelfContainedAccommodation.description: Non self contained accommodation indicator (SHBE field 205)

numberOfAdditionalRoomsForNonDependantCh.description: Number of additional rooms for non-dependant children away on operations in the armed forces (SHBE field 28)

numberOfAdditionalRoomsForSeverelyDisabl.description: Number of additional rooms for severely disabled person(s) (SHBE field 27)

numberOfBedroomsEntitledTo.description: For LHA cases and social sector cases, the number of rooms / bedrooms entitled to. Also bedroom number for temporary or short term accommodation cases subject to the LHA based subsidy rules (SHBE field 206)

partner.description:
Partner flag (SHBE field 123)
0 : No partner
1 : Yes one partner
2 : Yes more than one partner

passportedStandardClaimIndicator.description:
Passported / Standard claim indicator (SHBE field 12)
1 : in receipt of IS
2 : in receipt of Pension Credit (GC)
3 : in receipt of JSA (IB)
4 : Standard case (including Savings Credit only)
5 : in receipt of ESA (IB)

paymentFrequency.description:
Frequency of payment of HB (SHBE field 45)
1 : Weekly
2 : Fortnightly
3 : Four weekly
4 : Calendar Monthly
5 : Three monthly
6 : Six monthly
99 : Other

reasonForClosure.description:
Reason that HB claim was closed / withdrawn / decided unsuccessful / defective (SHBE field 210)
1 : Claimant death
2 : Claimant moved outside LA area
3 : Household income increased above HB threshold
4 : Household capital increased above HB capital limits
5 : Claimant moved outside scope of HB (into a nursing home, etc)
6 : Claim withdrawn
7 : Claim decided unsuccessful
8 : Defective claim
9 : Other
10 :  Natural Migration to Universal Credit
11 :  Managed Migration to Universal Credit Successful
12 :  Managed Migration to Universal Credit Failure (i.e. where the claimant fails to do what is necessary for UC to take up the claim)
13 :  Managed Migration to Pension Credit

reductionAsResultOfBenefitCap.description: Amount HB award is reduced as a result of benefit cap (SHBE field 42)

rsrsEasementReasonAdditionalRoomsForSeve.description: RSRS easement reason: Receives an additional (& separate) bedroom/s for severely disabled person(s) who can't share and would otherwise be expected to do so (SHBE field 25)

rsrsEasementReasonFosterCarer.description: RSRS easement reason: Receives an additional bedroom for foster carers (SHBE field 24)

rsrsEasementReasonNoAdditionalRoom.description: RSRS easement reason: No additional room (SHBE field 22)

rsrsEasementReasonNonDependantChildrenAw.description: RSRS easement reason: Retains a bedroom/s for non-dependant children away on operations in the armed forces (SHBE field 26)

rsrsEasementReasonNonResidentCarer.description: RSRS easement reason: Receives an additional bedroom entitlement due to a non-resident overnight carer (SHBE field 23)

startDate.description: HB Claim entitlement start date (SHBE field 41)

status.description:
Status of HB claim at extract date (SHBE field 33)
0 : HB not in payment (other than suspended)
1 : HB in payment
2 : HB payment suspended

transitionalProtectionFromLha.description: Transitional protection from the national rollout of the LHA (SHBE field 207)

typeOfChange.description:
Type of change (SHBE field 250)
1 : Automated annual uprating
2 : All other changes

weeklyEntitlementAfterChange.description: New weekly HB entitlement after the change (SHBE field 248)

weeklyEntitlementBeforeChange.description: Weekly HB entitlement before change (SHBE field 50)

weeklyUnderOccupationDeduction.description: Weekly amount of social sector size criteria/ under-occupation deduction (SHBE field 21)

fromDlaCareOrPipLivingComponents.description: Disability Living Allowance - care component or Personal Independence Payment - living component (SHBE field 99 or 155)

fromDlaOrPipMobilityComponents.description: Disability Living Allowance - mobility component or Personal Independence Payment - mobility component (SHBE field 100 or 156)

fromWorkingAndChildTaxCredits.description: Working Tax Credits and Child Tax Credits (SHBE field 98 or 154)

grossWeeklyIncomeFromEmployment.description: Gross Weekly Employment Income (SHBE field 76 or 133)

grossWeeklyIncomeFromRemunerativeWork.description: Gross weekly income from remunerative work (SHBE field 214)

grossWeeklyIncomeFromSelfEmployment.description: Gross Weekly Self-Employment Income (SHBE field 78 or 135)

incapacityBenefitLongTerm.description: Incapacity Benefit Long Term (SHBE field 96 or 152)

incapacityBenefitShortTermHigher.description: Incapacity Benefit Short Term Higher (SHBE field 95 or 151)

incapacityBenefitShortTermLower.description: Incapacity Benefit Short Term Lower (SHBE field 94 or 150)

incomeFromEsaAdditionalAmountDueToTransa.description: Weekly income from ESA: additional amount due to transitional protection from IB/SDA (SHBE field 30 or 31)

industrialInjuriesDisablementBenefit.description: Industrial Injuries Disablement Benefit (SHBE field 102 or 158)

modifiedAif.description: Adjusted Assessed Income Figure (SHBE field 74 or 132)

netWeeklyIncomeFromEmployment.description: Net Weekly Employment Income (SHBE field 77 or 134)

netWeeklyIncomeFromSelfEmployment.description: Net Weekly Self-Employment Income (SHBE field 79 or 136)

newDealFiftyPlusEmploymentCredit.description: New Deal Fifty Plus Employment Credit (SHBE field 97 or 153)

statutoryMaternityOrPaternityPay.description: Statutory Maternity Or Paternity Pay (SHBE field 104 or 161)

studentGrantOrLoan.description: Student Grant Or Loan (SHBE field 90 or 146)

totalAmountOfEarnedIncomeDisregarded.description: Total Disregarded Earned Income (SHBE field 80 or 137)

totalAmountOfIncomeDisregarded.description: Total amount of income disregarded (SHBE field 114 or 170)

totalNumbersOfRemunerativeWorkPerWeek.description: Total hours of remunerative work per week (SHBE field 241 or 242)

trainingForWorkOrCommunityAction.description: Training For Work Or Community Action (SHBE field 93 or 149)

warDisablementPensionOrArmedForcesGip.description: War Disablement Pension Or Armed Forces Gip (SHBE field 106 or 163)

warWidowOrWidowerPension.description: War Widow Or Widower Pension (SHBE field 108 or 165))

weeklyAmountOfChildcareComponentDisregar.description: Weekly Disregarded Childcare Component (SHBE field 81 or 138)

weeklyNotionalIncomeFromCapital.description: Capital (Claimant and Partner combined figure) (SHBE field 240)

status.description:
Non-dependant's status (SHBE field 16)
1 = student
2 = in receipt of Work-Based Learning or Young People Training Allowance
3 = prisoner
4 = in hospital for more than 52 weeks
5 = in receipt of IS or JSA(IB) or ESA(IB)
6 = not in receipt of passporting benefit or Pension Credit (Savings Credit) or remunerative employment (includes contributory based ESA) 
7 = in remunerative employment (excluding Pension Credit cases)
8 = in receipt of Pension Credit

gender.description:
Partner's gender (SHBE field 213)
M : Male
F : Female
X : gender is unknown

extendedPaymentCase.description:
Extended Payment Case (SHBE field 55)
0 : Not an extended payment case
1 : Extended payment case (IS / JSA(IB) / ESA(IB))
2 : Extended Payment Cases (IB / SDA / ESA(CB))

reasonForPaymentToLandlordAgent.description:
Reason for Payment to Landlord / Property Agent (SHBE field 53)
1 : Claimant choice / does not object (non-LHA only)
2 : Claimant interest (non-LHA only)
3 : Improbable that claimant will pay their rent (LHA only)
4 : Claimant has rent arrears equivalent to less than 8 weeks - discretionary 
5 : Claimant has rent arrears equivalent to 8 weeks or more - mandatory 
6 : Unknown
7 : Claimant likely to have difficulty in relation to the management of their financial affairs (LHA only)
8 : Paid to landlord to enable the claimant to secure or retain a tenancy in the private rented sector (LHA only)

rentAllowanceMethodOfPayment.description:
Rent Allowance Method of Payment (SHBE field 179)
1 : ACT
2 : Cheque
3 : Giro
99 : Other

rentAllowancePaymentDestination.description:
Rent Allowance Payment Destination (SHBE field 180)
1 : Payment to claimant, appointee or nominee
2 : Payment direct to landlord/property agent
3 : Split payment-excess paid to customer

rentOfficerDeterminedIneligibleCharges.description: Rent Officer determination of weekly ineligible charges (SHBE field 67)

timePeriodContractualRentFigureCovers.description:
Time period contractual rent figure covers (SHBE field 182)
1 = Weekly
2 = Calendar Monthly
3 = Annual
5 = Daily
6 = Fortnightly
7 = Four Weekly
8 = Quarterly ( or 3-monthly)
9 = Half-yearly (or 6 monthly)
99 = Other

timingOfRentPaymentAllowance.description:
Timing of payment of rent allowance (SHBE field 54)
1 : case paid wholly in advance
2 : case paid partly in advance and partly in arrears
3 : case paid wholly in arrears
4 : case receiving 'payment on account'

weeklyAdditionalDiscretionaryForRentLiab.description: Weekly additional discretionary payment for rent liability (SHBE field 70)

weeklyDeductionForMeals.description: Total weekly deduction for meals (SHBE field 69)
